item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, July 16, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump picks Ohio senator Vance as 2024 running mate
2. Trump has ‘well-founded plans’ for Russia-Ukraine peace talks, Orbán claims
3. UK private schools warn of ‘race to the bottom’ over VAT policy
4. Europe fears weakened security ties with US as Trump picks JD Vance
5. [Opinion] The US itself could be the biggest loser in this election
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, July 16, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
